A B C E F G H I M P R S T U V W

A

addBetsInCompetition(GamblingBetsForCompetition) - Method in class content.Gambler
Adds GamblingBetsForCompetition to this Gambler object if adds succed then calculate also the gain of this Gambler
addBetToBookMaker(GamblingBetsForCompetition) - Method in class content.BookMaker
Adds the GamblingBetsForCompetition object to GamblingBetsForCompetition Collection and updates the gain field of this BookMaker
addBetToCompetition(GamblingBetsForCompetition) - Method in class content.Competition
Adds a new bet of a Bookmaker for a Gambler to this Competition
addCompetitionToHorse(HorseInCompetition) - Method in class content.Horse
Add Horse to a Competition and if succeed then updates also the total participate times filed of this horse and update his trainer TotalWinnerHorses filed's
addEquestrian(Equestrian) - Method in class content.Horse
Adds an Equestrian object to Horse
addEquestrianToHorse(String, String, String) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Adds an existed Equestrian to an existed horse returns true if the adding process succeed, otherwise returns false if: 1) The horse is not exists in the horses 2) The Equestrian is not exists in the persons map 3) The existed Equestrian is already added to the existed horse 4) The existed horse is already has a Equestrian Otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't removes the Equestrian to the existed horse) if the adding is not completly succeded
addGamblingBetsForCompetition(String, String, String, String, String, int, Type, double) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Adds a Gambler bet on a Horse in a Competition throuth the Bookmaker The method return false if: 1) The given bookmaker is not exists in persons map 2) The given gambler is not exists in persons map 3) The given Competition is not exists 4) The given horse is not exists in horses map Otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't adds the bet) if the adding is not completly succeded
addHorse(Horse) - Method in class content.Equestrian
Add Horse to Equestrian object
addHorse(Horse) - Method in class content.Trainer
Add Horse to trainer horses-array
addHorse(Horse) - Method in class content.Veterinarian
Adds Horse to veterinarian horses-array
addHorse(String, String, Date, double, Character, Color, double, Genre, double, int) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Adds new horse to horses map return true if the adding process success return false if the horse already exist
addHorseToCompetition(HorseInCompetition) - Method in class content.Competition
Adds a Horse to Competition if and only if the Horse is Fitted to the Competition conditions.
addHorseToCompetition(String, String, int, String, Type, Date, short) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Adds a Horse to a Competition.
addPerson(Person) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Adds a given person to the Persons Map.
addTrainer(Trainer) - Method in class content.Horse
Adds a Trainer Object to Horse
addTrainerToHorse(String, String, String, String) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Adds an existed trainer to an existed horse returns true if the adding process succeed, otherwise returns false if: 1) The horse is not exists in the horses map 2) The trainer is not exists in the persons map 3) The existed trainer is already added to the existed horse 4) The existed horse is already has a trainer Otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't adds the Trainer to the existed horse) if the adding is not completly succeded
addVeterinarian(Veterinarian) - Method in class content.Horse
Adds a Veterinarian object to Horse
addVeterinarianToHorse(String, String, String, String) - Method in class init.BreedingHorses
Adds an existed Veterinarian to an existed horse returns true if the adding process succeed, otherwise returns false if: 1) The horse is not exists in the horses map 2) The Veterinarian is not exists in the persons map 3) The existed Veterinarian is already added to the existed horse 4) The existed horse is already has a three Veterinarians otherwise this method makes a roll-back (i.e don't add the Veterinarian to an existed horse) if the adding is not completly succeded
